column4: hi, I have a 100mb partition with GRUB in it, now I want to remove it and boot directly to windows 7, how do I do it? I followed the step 3 in this link, but I don't think it worked, http://neosmart.net/wiki/display/EBCD/Recovering+the+Vista+Bootloader+from+the+DVD, please help :D
how do I do that? :S hahaha
